About Me

Everything you need to know about who I am

BIO

I'm a final year Computer Science and Software Engineering student in Maynooth Univeristy. I'm also a full-stack developer, with preference to JavaScript development. I have a passion for seeing a project through from design, development and deployment.
Outside of work I have a huge interest in photography, guitar, gaming and staying fit!

The Dock - Accenture

Software Engineering Intern | January 2018 - August 2018

I Worked on various projects as a full stack engineer in Agile teams. Developed frontend in React.js & D3. Backend written in Node.js, MongoDB and Flask. Experience with Jenkins & AWS for continuous integration. Gave product demonstrations and updates to stakeholders and managers.
I was also acted as a photographer in work, taking portraits for workers and capturing company events to help build the brand of the business.

Maynooth University

Software Engineering Intern | June 2017 - September 2017

Worked with Dr. John Keating on a pedagogical tool for linguistic students. Developed the backend in Node & MongoDB, using Angular 1 for the frontend. Developed my full stack engineering, research & organisational skills.
This exposure to research allowed me how to work alone effectively, seeing as I was the sole developer on the project. This really helped me curb procrastination levels and stay productive when working solo.

Maynooth Univeristy

Lab Demonstrator | September 2017 - Present

Lab Demonstrator for 1st year and H.Dip modules on introducing them to programming. Generally oversaw 10 students directly in each lab, helping them with their Java questions.
Developed strong communication skills, a concrete knowledge of programming fundamentals, leadership skills and teaching abilities.
